fulltext:
Phan Quoc Trung
135/27 Dinh Phong Phu, 9 District, Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam.
 0385917707  trungpq999@gmail.com  DoB: 03/13/1995
Zalo Group(20 months)
10/2017 - 06/2019
DEK Technologies(6 months)
04/2017 - 10/2017
WORK EXPERIENCE
Java Backend
- Analysis, design and development webgames (CCU ~7000 per game): 
  + Games: Tien Lenh Mien Nam ZingPlay(Poker Game), Ta La (Poker Game), iCa (Shooting Fish - core
member)
  + Analysis, design, implementation, deployment and maintenance of available backends for live games. 
  + Work on bug fixing and improving game performance.
- ZWebQos(Tool check quality of services : Zalo Chat, Zalo Food, Zalo Shop, ...)
   + Compute Parsing and Painting Web time.
   + Use Prophet(a forecasting tool - Facebook) to detect and alert anormal quality of service.
- Maintenance ZaloPayment System:
  + Problems: bug in-app purchase, move Database(MySQL) to another instance.
  + Add user-id in purchase-processing for tracking.
  + Add partition and re-indexing Database.
  + Create cron job collect and write to Database.
- DCC website(tool manage room)
  + Base on AngularJS, NodeJs.
  + CRUD training, meeting event and noti attendees.
- Maintenance MTAS(telecom system)
  + Research system, fix bug and write test case.
Ho chi minh University of Science
2014 - 2018
EDUCATION
Major: Software Engineer
SKILLS
- There is a passionate spirit of learning and progress.
- Good research skill, logical thinking, problem-solving.
- Passionate and knowledgeable about games, especially servers, backend, Realtime process.
- Strong Java foundation.
- Have knowledge about blocking & non blocking, socket, Networking, ElasticSearch, Caching, DataBase
Docker, Apache Thrift.
- Familiar with CI Jenkins, Agile Project Management.
